ya10.3.6:1.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:2.1: « Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:3.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:4.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:5.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:6.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:7.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:8.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānitthāti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:9.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:10.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:11.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:12.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti. Anāgāmī domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññindriyañca bhāvessati.
ya10.3.6:13.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:14.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha. Anāgāmī aññindriyañca bhāvessati domanassindriyañca pajahittha.
ya10.3.6:15.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:16.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:17.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:18.1: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha. Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:19.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:20.1: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti. Pañca puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:21.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati. So anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:22.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha. Pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:23.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:24.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati. Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:25.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:26.1: Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha. Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:27.1: » Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:28.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:29.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.6:30.1: Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissanti. Cattāro puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.6:31.1: « Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:32.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha. Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:33.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:34.1: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:35.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:36.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:37.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:38.1: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:39.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:40.1: Arahā aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha. Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:41.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:42.1: Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:43.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:44.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:45.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:46.1: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Cha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:47.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:48.1: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.6:49.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:50.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca nappajahittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:51.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:52.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.6:53.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:54.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca nappajahittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:55.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:56.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:57.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:58.1: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:59.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:60.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:61.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:62.1: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:63.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:64.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.6:65.1: » Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:66.1: Aṭṭha puggalā aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:67.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:68.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
